title: Update 3
changes: Added 6 pistol variants: Pistol, Pistol MK2, Heavy Pistol, .50, AP Pistol, XM3 (with mags & suppressors)
Added Assault Shotgun with magazine variants

title: Update 2
changes: Added 4 LMGs: Combat MG, Combat MG MK2, MG, Gusenberg (with barrels & mags)
Added large weapons: RPG, Homing Launcher, Grenade Launcher
Added complete sniper collection: Sniper, Marksman, Marksman MK2, Musket, Precision Rifle

title: First Release - Complete Rifle Pack
changes: 13 Assault Rifles: Advanced, Assault, Compact AK, Bullpup, Carbine, Special Carbine (all with MK2 variants)
Added Battle Rifle, Military Rifle, Service Rifle
Base Shotguns: Combat Shotgun, Pump, Pump MK2
All rifles include body textures, magazines (1-3 variants), barrels, and sights
